Welcome to MD380Tool, a friendly little Android frontend to the firmware patches by KK4VCZ, DD4CR, and friends.


To use this tool, you will need a recent Android phone with USB Host Mode support, a USB OTG adapter, and the programming cable that came with your MD380.


This tool works on both VHF and UHF models of the MD380, as well as the Retevis R3. Don't try it with the MD280 or MD446 unless you are very brave.


Begin by Clicking the 'Connect' button below. You might also need to upgrade your firmware to include our patches.


The menu on the left contains various tools for working with the patched firmware.


Have fun!
 --Travis KK4VCZ
